file_content.text: Thank you again for your assistance. Now please leave. You'll blow my cover.
Here. I got the Kingstrike pieces.
I'll see that the Republic receives these immediately.
Ulgo almost achieved a major victory today. Thanks to you, his loss is our gain.
No thanks required.
Modesty's rare on Alderaan. I appreciate it.
My power's unequaled.
I don't doubt it.
I must leave.
This operation must remain confidential, but your services won't be forgotten. Good work.
I've told you everything I know. Contact me once you've found the Kingstrike components.
Perfect timing. I was beginning to lose hope.
Republic SIS, working undercover for Ulgo. Name's Kamen Proy.
I'm risking my life to contact you, so listen closely, don't attract any attention.
Why are you breaking your cover?
What's going on?
There's an emergency. I can't wait around for a strike team to arrive.
I'm not who you think I am.
I heard you were in the area. Right now I can't trust anyone else.
Suddenly, I want to scream and wave my arms around.
You're not the boss of me.
Please be serious. This is an emergency.
Ulgo's completed the development of a new precision weapon--the U-20 Kingstrike.
With these cannons, his dreadnaughts can hit a target from space with perfect accuracy. I've seen the test results.
The first Kingstrike's being dismantled now for transport off Alderaan. It must not reach Ulgo's fleet!
Demolish the weapon before it claims Republic lives.
Destroy it.
There may be another solution.
The Republic could learn much from this weapon.
Seize it for research.
Precisely my thoughts. I'll need your help to secure it.
Republic ships could intercept the weapon's transport, blow it out of the sky.
Destroy it in transit.
We can't risk it. This situation requires a ground assault.
Snatch the weapon. Something like that should fetch a small fortune.
Steal it.
I'm not in this to turn a profit. There's another solution.
What are you proposing?
We must act immediately.
How's this my responsibility?
I'm still undercover. Besides, frontal assaults aren't my forte.
If we're careful, you could destroy the weapon and walk away with enough information for the Republic to duplicate the tech.
To do this, you must storm Ulgo's base, find the Kingstrike pieces and strip them of their components.
The weapon's mechanisms will be in your hands shortly.
I'll do it immediately.
Excellent. The sooner we rebuild the Kingstrike, the sooner the war for Alderaan turns in our favor.
If I must.
You're making the right decision.
I won't obey. [Refuse quest]
Then the operation's forfeit. I'll include your decision in my report.
Keep moving. You never saw me.
I got the Kingstrike pieces, plus that targeting module you wanted.
I--I didn't think it was possible. Well done!
It was possible. Barely.
I'm glad you were able to manage.
One component is vital--the targeting module. It must be recovered or destroyed.
Ulgo can't rebuild the Kingstrike without it, but if we get it, the Republic's production time will be halved.
You'll find it in the docking bay, under heavy guard. If you can't retrieve the module, use this EMP charge to fry it.
[This is a restricted access holoterminal. There are currently no incoming calls.]
